meanings.definition: The quality or state of being detectable.
meanings.sent1: The detectability of the hidden object amazed the scientist.
meanings.sent2: The detective relied on the detectability of fingerprints to solve the case.
meanings.sent3: The detectability of the ghost in the haunted house made for a comical scene.
meanings.sent4: The detectability of the truth shone through his lies like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The detectability of the scent led the bloodhound straight to the missing child.

meanings.sent2: The detectability of the virus in the blood sample confirmed the diagnosis.
meanings.sent3: The detectability of the ninja in the dark room was like a game of hide-and-seek.
